title: Deep and surface mining coal production in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 1970 to 2018
summary: Overall Deep mined is rapidly decreasing, Surface mining is gradually decreasing,  throughout the Year
The ranking of the lines from topmost to botommmost is as follows: 1. Deep mined, and lastly, 2. Surface mining.
The minimum Production volume in thousand metric tons about 11993.0, occured at 2012 by Surface mining.
Deep mined has decreased by 83.34152399420898 percent.
The difference of Production volume in thousand metric tons between Deep mined and Surface mining is smaller at Year 2012 compared to the Year 1985.
